text: Butler is a city in Bates County, Missouri, United States. The population was 4,220 at the 2020 census. It is the county seat of Bates County. The city is named for William Orlando Butler, a noted American military and political figure of the early and mid-19th century. It is about fifty miles south of Kansas City, Missouri on U.S. Route 71-Interstate 49. ==References== Category:Cities in Missouri Category:County seats in Missouri Category:Settlements in Bates County, Missouri
title: Butler, Missouri
